ygData.subject: Re: magic resist
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Best thing you can do is whack the king in Sol B (Crown is +20 magic resist) add that to a glowing black stone (+10) a  Platinum Wolf s Eye Agate Neckless
ygData.messageBody:
Lim Dul wrote:

> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> Just curious, what's everyone's magic resist at? Mine is somewhere like
> 45-49 with my own buffs. With a cleric or bard, I've seen it somewhere in
> the high 80s.
>
> Anybody know a more consistent way to keep this higher? I wish we had a
> personal buff to boost this up more...you'd figure a master of magic would
> have more resistance in this area? :)
>
> I got that Thex dagger thingie that boosts SV disease up +50. That's nice
> but I wish there was something like that for magic resist.

Best thing you can do is whack the king in Sol B (Crown is +20 magic resist)
add that to a glowing black stone (+10) a Platinum Wolf's Eye Agate Neckless
(+9) a pair of Gold WEA bracers (+7ea) and a pair of Platinum Jacinth Rings
(+10ea) That will give you a total of +73 sv vs Magic, before buffs, but
that will probably sacrifice most of your Intellegence items. I hope this
helps. By the way, did you do the Thex dagger quest alone, or with a
friend? What level do you recommend?

Cheers
Malkin
